explicit_company_mention_count.description: Number of companies explicitly listed in the news item.

first_appearance_sentence_number.description: Sentence number where the asset is first referenced in the news item.

negative_sentiment_probability_2.description: Probability that the sentiment is negative for the asset.

neutral_sentiment_probability_2.description: Probability that the sentiment is neutral for the asset.

news_relevance_score.description: Score reflecting how pertinent the news item is to the asset.

news_urgency_level.description: Integer indicating the urgency or type of the news story.

nws31_amertimestamp_date.description: The date when the news arrived (American time)

nws31_amertimestamp_time.description: The time when the news arrived(American time)

nws31_apactimestamp_date.description: The date when the news arrived (Asian time)

nws31_apactimestamp_time.description: The time when the news arrived(Asian time)

nws31_bodysize.description: The size of the current version of the story body in characters

nws31_companycount.description: The number of companies explicitly listed in the news item in the subjects field

nws31_d1_bodysize.description: The size of the current version of the story body in characters

nws31_d1_companycount.description: The number of companies explicitly listed in the news item in the subjects field

nws31_d1_feedtimestamp_date.description: The date when the data was available on the feed

nws31_d1_feedtimestamp_time.description: The time when the data was available on the feed

nws31_d1_firstcreated_date.description: UTC timestamp for the first version of the story (date)

nws31_d1_firstcreated_time.description: UTC timestamp for the first version of the story (time)

nws31_d1_firstmentionsentence.description: The first sentence, starting with the headline, in which the scored asset is mentioned. Thus, a value of 1 denotes the headline, 2 the first sentence of the story body, 3 the second sentence, etc.

nws31_d1_noveltycounts.description: The number of similar items on a particular asset within 5 time windows. The periods are 12 hours, 24 hours, 3 days, 5 days and 7 days prior to the news item's timestamp.

nws31_d1_relevance.description: The number indicating the relevance of the news item to the asset. It ranges from 0 to 1.

nws31_d1_sentencecount.description: The total number of sentences in the news item

nws31_d1_sentimentClass.description: This field indicates the predominant sentiment class for this news item with respect to this asset

nws31_d1_sentimentnegative.description: The probability that the sentiment of the news item was negative for the asset

nws31_d1_sentimentneutral.description: The probability that the sentiment of the news item was neutral for the asset

nws31_d1_sentimentpositive.description: The probability that the sentiment of the news item was positive for the asset

nws31_d1_sentimentwordcount.description: The number of lexical tokens (words and punctuation) in the sections of the item text that are deemed relevant to the asset

nws31_d1_sourcetimestamp_date.description: UTC timestamp of this news item (date)

nws31_d1_sourcetimestamp_time.description: UTC timestamp of this news item (time)

nws31_d1_volumecounts.description: The number of items on a particular asset within 5 time windows. The periods are 12 hours, 24 hours, 3 days, 5 days, and 7 days prior to the news item's timestamp

nws31_d1_wordcount.description: The total number of lexical tokens (words and punctuation) in the news item. Can be used in conjunction with sentimentWordCount to determine the proportion of the news item discussing an asset

nws31_emeatimestamp_date.description: The date when the news arrived (European time)

nws31_emeatimestamp_time.description: The time when the news arrived(European time)

nws31_feedtimestamp_time.description: The time when the data was available on the feed

nws31_firstcreated_time.description: UTC timestamp for the first version of the story(time)

nws31_firstmentionsentence.description: The first sentence, starting with the headline, in which the scored asset is mentioned Thus, a value of 1 denotes the headline, 2 the first sentence of the story body, 3 the second sentence, etc

nws31_linkedidpositions.description: Position of the linkedId in the complete list of linked Ids 0 is the first/oldest, and the largest/most recent is the 7-day itemCount minus 1

nws31_noveltycounts.description: The number of similar items on a particular asset within 5 time windows The periods are 12 hours, 24 hours, 3 days, 5 days and 7 days prior to the news item’s timestamp

nws31_relevance.description: The number indicating the relevance of the news item to the asset It ranges from 0 to 1

nws31_sentencecount.description: The total number of sentences in the news item

nws31_sentimentclass.description: This field indicates the predominant sentiment class for this news item with respect to this asset

nws31_sentimentnegative.description: The probability that the sentiment of the news item was negative for the asset

nws31_sentimentneutral.description: The probability that the sentiment of the news item was neutral for the asset

nws31_sentimentpositive.description: The probability that the sentiment of the news item was positive for the asset

nws31_sentimentwordcount.description: The number of lexical tokens (words and punctuation) in the sections of the item text that are deemed relevant to the asset

nws31_sourcetimestamp_time.description: UTC timestamp of this news item(time)

nws31_subjects.description: Topic codes and company identifiers that relate to this news item

nws31_volumecounts.description: The number of items on a particular asset within 5 time windows The periods are 12 hours, 24 hours, 3 days, 5 days and 7 days prior to the news item’s timestamp

nws31_windows.description: The windowed count group is used to associate a count with the window of time it relates to It is used for the noveltyCounts and volumeCountsLength of time the count covers nH (for hours) or nD (for days) Default values are “12H”, “24H”, “3D”, “5D”, and “7D”

nws31_wordcount.description: The total number of lexical tokens (words and punctuation) in the news itemCan be used in conjunction with sentimentWordCount to determine the proportion of the news item discussing an asset

positive_sentiment_probability_2.description: Probability that the sentiment is positive for the asset.

predominant_sentiment_class.description: Main sentiment classification for the asset in the news item.

sentiment_analysis_word_count.description: Number of words used in the sentiment calculation for the asset.

story_body_character_count.description: Total number of characters in the news story body.

total_sentence_count.description: Total number of sentences in the news item.

total_word_token_count.description: Total number of words and punctuation tokens in the news item.
